data.comment: Atalanta kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 3, Diego Farias (Spezia) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 3, Matteo Ricci (Spezia) has received a first yellow card.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Antonio Rapuano awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Spezia's Diego Farias misses with an attempt on goal.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
Atalanta's Josip Ilicic is whistled for offside at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Spezia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Atalanta to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Atalanta's Robin Gosens breaks free at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
In the minute 16, Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
In La Spezia Atalanta's Duvan Zapata is caught offside.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 21, Atalanta are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 23, Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atalanta's half?
Antonio Rapuano waits before resuming play because Fabio Depaoli for Atalanta is still down.
It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 25, Cristiano Piccini (Atalanta) has replaced the possibly injured Fabio Depaoli at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 27, Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stadio Alberto Picco, Nahuel Estevez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 29, M'bala Nzola for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in Spezia.
Tommaso Pobega (Spezia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in La Spezia.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 37, Spezia are coming forward and Tommaso Pobega gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Antonio Rapuano awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Atalanta's Robin Gosens has been booked in La Spezia.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Atalanta.
Duvan Zapata hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in La Spezia for Atalanta.
In the minute 40, Antonio Rapuano signals a Atalanta throw-in in Spezia's half.
Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Spezia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atalanta.
Papu Gomez for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 43, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 45, In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Rapuano signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Spezia's area.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Spezia have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Atalanta's Robin Gosens has run offside.
The first half has been concluded at Stadio Alberto Picco.
The second-half has commenced. Spezia with the kick-off.
Antonio Rapuano signals a Atalanta throw-in in Spezia's half.
In the minute 46, Atalanta make their second substitution with Mario Pasalic replacing Papu Gomez.
Giulio Maggiore is replacing Tommaso Pobega for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 47, Free kick Atalanta.
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Spezia.
Spezia needs to be cautious. Atalanta have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 51, Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
Free kick Spezia.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
In the minute 52, Mario Pasalic is booked for the away team.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
In the minute 54, In La Spezia Atalanta attack through Rafael Toloi. The finish is off target, however.
Antonio Rapuano awards Spezia a goal kick.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In the minute 55, Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a second substitution, with Federico Mattiello replacing Luca Vignali.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in La Spezia.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Throw-in for Spezia close to the penalty box.
Spezia are pushing forward but Emmanuel Gyasi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
Emmanuel Gyasi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spezia.
Spezia have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 63, Riccardo Marchizza is replacing Simone Bastoni for the home team.
M'bala Nzola (Spezia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Spezia.
Claudio Terzi (Spezia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
The away team replace Duvan Zapata with Sam Lammers.
Sam Lammers for Atalanta drives towards goal at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
M'bala Nzola of Spezia gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
Throw-in Spezia.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
In La Spezia, Robin Gosens (Atalanta) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 75, Julian Chabot is on a sub for Claudio Terzi for Spezia.
Alessandro Deiola is replacing Nahuel Estevez for the home team.
In the minute 76, Antonio Rapuano awards the away team a throw-in.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Antonio Rapuano signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Atalanta's area.
In the minute 79, Antonio Rapuano awards the home team a throw-in.
Important block from the Atalanta defence as Giulio Maggiore fires in a strike for Spezia.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Spezia.
In the minute 81, Spezia's M'bala Nzola gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta's Robin Gosens is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Gian Piero Gasperini is making the team's fourth substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with Bosko Sutalo replacing Cristiano Piccini.
Atalanta make their fifth substitution with Aleksey Miranchuk replacing Josip Ilicic.
In the minute 85, Matteo Pessina (Atalanta) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In La Spezia Atalanta drive forward through Mario Pasalic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Atalanta pushes forward through Mario Pasalic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Spezia.
Free kick Spezia.
At Stadio Alberto Picco the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Antonio Rapuano signals a Spezia throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta push forward at Stadio Alberto Picco and Robin Gosens gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spezia defence.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Mario Pasalic for Atalanta is whistled offside.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
The match has come to a close in La Spezia. The final score is 0-0.
